name: Obambo
trait:
The Obambo has a calm and an aggresive state. It switches between this states every two minutes.
 
When calm the Obambo has a speed of 1,36m/s, when agressive 2,04m/s.
ability:
The Obambo will switch between the states not only during a hunt but during the whole investigation.
 
When calm the Obambo will hunt at 15% average sanity, when aggresive at 65% average sanity.
